title: Shopify’s ‘Magic’ AI image editor can make any product pics look professional
content: Shopify’s ‘Magic’ AI image editor can make any product pics look professional Shopify adds more AI features to the platform. It now offers AI image editing for sellers to change backgrounds on product photos and more intuitive searches.

title: SEO Step-by-Step Tutorial: 8 Easy Basics for Beginners to Master
content: SEO Step-by-Step Tutorial: 8 Easy Basics for Beginners to Master You want to learn about search engine optimization (SEO), but where do you start? You’ve probably heard of a few basic terms, like keyword research, but what else do you need to know?

title: A search engine in 80 lines of Python
content: A search engine in 80 lines of Python In this post I explain how I built a search engine from scratch using python. The resulting search engine is used to search in the posts of the blogs I follow.
